value.title: An AI Was Taught to Play the World's Hardest Video Game and Still Couldn't Set a New Record
value.excerpt: What’s the hardest video game you’ve ever played? If it wasn’t QWOP then let me tell you right know that you don’t know how truly difficult a game can be. The deceptively simple running game is so challenging to master that even an AI trained using machine learning still only mustered a top 10 score instead of shattering the record.
